name: ExampleVacationManagement

text.value: Welcome to the Tahiti Vacation Management Tool. Here you can see how many days of vacation you have available, see the status of your vacation requests, and submit a new vacation request.
If you are a manager, you can see the vacation status for your team and review pending requests.
To modify the selected vacation request, update the details in the Selected request line, and then click Modify selected vacation.
To cancel the selected vacation request, click Cancel selected vacation. If the request is already approved, a cancellation request will be sent to your manager.
